casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Joshua SANCHEZ 410P16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 7, 2016 Rudolph A. Ashton, III, Attorney at Law, New Bern, for Sanchez, Joshua. Ebony J. Pittman, Assistant Attorney General, N. Lorrin Freeman, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 4th of November 2016 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 7th of November 2016."
